com.foreach.across.core.context.bootstrap

Class AcrossBootstrapConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.foreach.across.core.context.bootstrap.AcrossBootstrapConfig

  • public class AcrossBootstrapConfig
extends Object
    Represents the global bootstrap configuration for the AcrossContext.

      • getContext

        public AcrossContext getContext()

      • hasModule

        public boolean hasModule(String moduleName)
        Parameters:
        moduleName - Unique name of the module.
        Returns:
        True if the module with that name is configured on the context.

      • getModule

        public ModuleBootstrapConfig getModule(String moduleName)
        Parameters:
        moduleName - Unique name of the module.
        Returns:
        Bootstrap configuration instance for that module.

      • extendModule

        public boolean extendModule(String moduleName,
                   Class... configurationClasses)
        Method to add one or more configuration classes to a module bootstrap configuration. The module is identified by its name. This method is safe to use in all circumstances: if the module is not configured in the context only the return value will be false but no exception will occur.
        Parameters:
        moduleName - Unique name of the module in the context.
        configurationClasses - Annotated class instances.
        Returns:
        True if the module was present.

      • extendModule

        public boolean extendModule(String moduleName,
                   ApplicationContextConfigurer... configurers)
        Method to add one or more configurers to a module bootstrap configuration. The module is identified by its name. This method is safe to use in all circumstances: if the module is not configured in the context only the return value will be false but no exception will occur.
        Parameters:
        moduleName - Unique name of the module in the context.
        configurers - Configurers to add to the bootstrap.
        Returns:
        True if the module was present.

      • extendModule

        public boolean extendModule(String moduleName,
                   BeanFilter... exposeFilters)
        Method to add one or more expose filter to a module bootstrap configuration.
        Parameters:
        moduleName - Unique name of the module in the context.
        exposeFilters - BeanFilter instances to add as additional expose filters.
        Returns:
        True if the module was present.
